DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of Atorvastin vs Simvastatin in decreasing LDL-C in diabetic subjects with hypercholesterolemia at the end of the treatment phase.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy And Safety Study Of Atorvastatin Versus Simvastatin In Type 2 Diabetic Subjects With Hypercholesterolemia
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of type 2 diabetes mellitus LDLC > 130 mg/dL Insulin therapy Clinically relevant organ disease (creatininemia >2mg/dL, CHF NYHA III and IV)
